LANGUAGES SPOKENProspecting, Qualifying, Sales Pipeline Development.
Product Demonstrations.
Product Owner.
Lead generation and fostering them: Generate the new lead and
foster them.
Examine the requirement of the customer and, maintaining the
documents of requirement.
Sales prospects, maintaining healthy prospects of sales. Acting as a
liaison between the development team and the business team,
staying connected with the Client.
Monthly demonstration of MVPs to the Clients.
Cold Calling - Cold Emailing: Reaching new clients and taking follow-
ups for future prospects.
Initiating the relationship with the healthy prospects through
LinkedIn.
Product demonstrations to the clients after setting successful
meetings.

input.additional_info: Innovate Dynamics Ltd. prioritizes applicants from top-tier universities such as [University X] and [University Y]. Relocation assistance is available for candidates willing to move to Hyderabad. Technical skills are assessed through standardized tests and a series of interviews. Our company encourages diversity and inclusivity in the hiring process.
minimum_requirements: 3-5 years of experience in business development or related fields
Proficiency in MS Office Suite and data analysis tools
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
